root.description: The trap door opens silently. The room is bright and warm, but eerie.

exit.description: A wooden [ladder] climbs down to a trap door in the floor.

prop.description: A cackling [witch] cries some incantation in a hoarse voice.
prop.onCheck: She is fat and aged, brimming with dark magic and a vile spirit.
Geralt: "What a curse is on this [whip]! Almost I used it to further torture this tortured soul."

character.description: [Joss] pulls his [mother] through the trap door.
character.onCheck: He crouches low, pulling his [mother]'s are over his shoulder.
character.onTalk: [Joss] will not speak so close to the [witch].

character.onCheck: She leans over her son, nearly spent.
character.onTalk: She will not speak so close to the [witch].
